revision.text: '''{{class|Actor}}''' {{c|void '''ClearModelFlag'''(int ''flag'')}} {{c|void '''A_ClearModelFlag'''(int ''flag'')}} â€” ''Action function version for calling from {{class|StateProvider}} and {{class|PSprite|PSprites}}.'' == Usage == Clears the specified [[MODELDEF]] flags of the model currently attached to the actor. === Parameters === *{{c|int '''flag'''}}: :The flag(s) to remove from the model. Multiple flags can be combined with |. You can use any of the {{const|MDL_}} constants from the list below: {{: Model flags}} == Examples == {{noexamples}} == See also == * [[SetModelFlag]] * [[ResetModelFlags]] [[Category:ZScript]]
